title: Cramer: Warren Buffett's aversion to iPhones might've been what kept him out of Amazon and Alphabet
text: 1.19 +0.00 ( +0.02% ) Cramer: Warren Buffett's aversion to iPhones might've been what kept him out of Amazon and Alphabet Elizabeth Gurdus Reblog "Mad Money" host Jim Cramer wonders if Warren Buffett's reluctance to use Apple iPhones was what stopped his fund from investing in Amazon and Alphabet's stocks. As Berkshire Hathaway BRK.A wraps up its event-filled annual shareholder meeting , CNBC's Jim Cramer reflected on some of the weekend's most interesting revelations. Warren Buffett , the CEO of Berkshire and a widely renowned investor, admitted on Saturday that he "made the wrong decisions on Google and Amazon AMZN ," having considered both stocks with his longtime partner, Charlie Munger .
